story.text: The school camp was buzzing with excitement as students unpacked their gear, looking forward to a weekend filled with adventure and camaraderie. Among them, Leo and his friends shared jokes and plans for exploring the surrounding wilderness.

story.name: Leo
story.text: This place looks amazing. We should check out the woods later!

story.name: Sebastian
story.text: Definitely! I heard there's a cliff with a great view around here.

story.name: Simon
story.text: Sounds like a plan. Let's give ourselves a good scare!
As the day waned, the group, filled with a sense of adventure, wandered off towards the rumored cliff, leaving the safety of the camp behind.

story.name: Simon
story.text: Hey Sebastian, catch this!Simon's voice was playful, but his prank was ill-fated.

story.alt: The sudden silence following the tragedy at the cliff
